name: Bowie The Frog
description:
Bowie The Frog is an endless runner designed for mobile devices. Run through procedurally generated terrain, collect pasta, and dodge those pesky lava pits & beetles.

Controls

  • Flip Gravity - Space Bar/Click Screen/"A" Button

Credits

  • Dallen Larson - Creator
  • Mattie Pride - Music Creator
  • Adam Helquist - Helper
  • Brenya Faith - Helper
